title: TypeScript helper for Experiment Tracker data
author: Ivy P.
description: Adds a raw SQL helper to fetch organization rows.

lines.content: export async function fetchExperimentTracker(db: DatabaseClient, orgId: string) {
const sql = `SELECT * FROM experiment_tracker WHERE org_id = '${orgId}'`;

bugPatterns.description: Builds SQL via string interpolation and allows injection.
